    • deleteBookmarkList

      public SuccessMessage deleteBookmarkList(Long id) throws DAOException, IOException, RestApiException
      Deletes the current user's bookmark list with the given id. If no such bookmark list could be found a message with 'success:false' is returned, otherwise one with 'success:true'
